rundown: 8-3 W vs Houston Astros Joey Wentz: 4.0 innings, 2 earned runs, 6 hits, 0 HR, 5 strikeouts Batters: Sandy León (1 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 3 RBI) Ozzie Albies (2 hits - 4 AB, 3 RBI) Matt Olson (2 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 1 RBI) The Braves secured a convincing victory over the Houston Astros, showcasing a strong offensive performance. Key highlights include Sandy León's impactful home run and three RBIs, Ozzie Albies contributing with two hits and three RBIs, and Matt Olson adding to the score with a home run and two runs. The Braves' ability to capitalize on scoring opportunities was crucial in their win.
